name: semiyearly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
occurring twice a year: It is recommended that you go to the dentist for semi-yearly checkups to keep your teeth and gums healthy. As part of your semiyearly review, you will get an assessment of your strengths and the areas in which you could improve.
